2824.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_IN_NEX_SERVICE_TEMPORARILY
2824.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2824.short_description: Your PNID is temporarily banned from this game.
2824.long_description: The account you are trying to use has been temporarily banned from this game for breaking the rules.
2824.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire.
2824.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
